appName: Chinese Input - (注音,拼音,速成,語音)
displayName: Chinese Input - (注音,拼音,速成,語音)
display_name: Chinese Input - (注音,拼音,速成,語音)
display_long_description:
Chinese input app for Meta Quest 2/3+ with four methods: Zhuyin, Pinyin, Sucheng, and offline voice input, serving Greater China and overseas Chinese communities.

**Four Input Methods**

Zhuyin: MOE standard characters, four-row layout. Smart candidates from first symbol.

Pinyin: Simplified Chinese, QWERTY layout. Complete pinyin entries.

Sucheng: Cangjie radical input, 2-code max. Keys show radicals. Full Hong Kong Traditional Chinese support.

Offline Voice: Voice-to-text, fully offline. Auto Traditional/Simplified conversion.

**Features**

Bidirectional Traditional↔Simplified conversion. Smart candidates with instant display. Learning area shows zhuyin/pinyin/sucheng codes for any text. Copy to clipboard or search Google with one tap.

**Keyboard Layout**

Zhuyin: Four-row layout. Pinyin/Sucheng: QWERTY. Function keys: voice, backspace, space, copy, search. Switch between input methods. VR-optimized controls.

**Use Cases**

VR social chat, in-game communication, content creation, learning Chinese input methods.

**Privacy & Technical**

Fully offline, local processing, no data collection. VR-optimized, lightweight, fast.

**All Ages**

Suitable for all ages. MOE-standard characters.
